title: SEC Files Interlocutory Appeal: Ripple CTO Explains Legal Aspects
description:
David Schwartz comments on the SEC’s recent filing of the interlocutory appeal in the ongoing SEC-Ripple lawsuit. Schwartz clarifies that the SEC has the right to move forward with the appeal as the lawsuit hasn’t concluded.  While the SEC requests the court to pause further proceedings of the case until the end of the case, […]
